== Ubucon Asia ==
An annual Ubuntu conference gathers and connects Ubuntu local communities around Asia since 2021

=== Chat room for participants ===
Note: Rooms are all integrated.

* IRC: #ubucon-asia on libera.chat
* Matrix: https://matrix.to/#/#ubucon-asia:matrix.org
* Telegram: https://t.me/UbuConAsia
